this_title: The Story Of Us With Morgan Freeman
trans_title: 与摩根·弗里曼探寻我们的故事
introduction: Morgan Freeman will take viewers on a global journey to meet with people from all cultures whose lives are shaped in surprising ways by different fundamental forces, this time exploring themes that unite us all. Each episode will explore a single fundamental force or topic, including love, belief, power, war and peace, rebellion and freedom.
chinese_title: 与摩根·弗里曼探寻我们的故事
foreign_title: The Story Of Us With Morgan Freeman
